snippet: A shrinking labor pool in China has shifted more bargaining power to workers, and a mass walkout illustrated their willingness to use it.
abstract: Mass walkout at Yue Yuen Industrial Holdings, world's largest manufacturer of branded athletic shoes, illustrates growing might of Chinese workers amid shrinking labor pool, slowing economy and Communist Party's fears of social unrest; nearly 40,000 workers have been on strike for two weeks over revelation that company had for years underpaid social security contributions.
lead_paragraph: A shrinking labor pool in China has shifted more bargaining power to workers, and a mass walkout illustrated their willingness to use it.

headline.main: Plying Social Media, Chinese Workers Grow Bolder in Exerting Clout
headline.print_headline: Plying Social Media, Chinese Workers Grow Bolder in Exerting Clout
